name: bwsm-eso
description: This is a Bitwarden Secrets Manager ESO wrapper based on the OpenAPI 3.0 specification.

scripts.start-docker: BWS_ACCESS_TOKEN=$BWS_ACCESS_TOKEN docker run --platform linux/amd64 --rm --name bwsm-eso -e BWS_ACCESS_TOKEN -p 8080:8080 bwsm-eso:latest
scripts.start-docker-arm: BWS_ACCESS_TOKEN=$BWS_ACCESS_TOKEN docker run --platform linux/arm64 --rm --name bwsm-eso-arm -e BWS_ACCESS_TOKEN -p 8080:8080 bwsm-eso:latest
scripts.docker: npm run build-docker && npm run start-docker
scripts.docker-arm: npm run build-docker-arm && npm run start-docker-arm
